text: Hans Friderichs (born 16 October 1931) is a German politician who was the Minister of Economy from 1972 to 1977 during the Willy Brandt and Helmut Schmidt governments. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Economy ministers of Germany Category:Politicians of the Free Democratic Party of Germany Category:Politicians from Rhineland-Palatinate
title: Hans Friderichs
